Question
========

In a study of the effect of education on anxiety in patients facing unpleasant surgery, 10 men who received standard education afterward anxiety was measured via a VAS score, as well as in 6 men after comprehensive education._______________________ Standard: n = 10, mean = 35.10, standard deviation = 29.39. Comprehensive: n = 6, mean = 27.17, standard deviation = 24.32. The value of the test size for testing the null hypothesis that the population averages are equal is (without any minus sign) equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.55
* 1.07
* 0.039
* 0.51

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.55: Correct
* 1.07: Incorrect
* 0.039: Incorrect
* 0.51: Incorrect
